title: Brad Pitt and Jennifer Aniston 'in contact via text' and 'have been friends for a while'
text:
Brad Pitt and Jennifer Aniston 'in contact via text' and 'have been friends for a while' Brad is said to be confiding in his ex after splitting from Angelina Jolie last year Share Texting: Brad Pitt and Jennifer Aniston (Photo: Getty) Share Get daily updates directly to your inbox + Subscribe Could not subscribe, try again later Invalid Email 
Brad Pitt and Jennifer Aniston have reportedly been in contact. 
The single Hollywood actor, who split from Angelina Jolie last year, is said to be confiding in the Friends star. 
A source told People magazine : “They have been friends for a while and often text.” 
Jennifer and Brad divorced in 2005, and the source adds that their recent communication isn't unusual. The pair divorced in 2005 (Photo: WireImage) 
“This is nothing new, he didn’t have to jump through hoops to get Jennifer’s number.” 
Angelina filed for divorce from Brad in September and although they have decided to go their separate ways, she recently said she hopes the whole thing will make them a "stronger" unit. 
Speaking to BBC World News, Angelina explained: "I don’t want to say very much about that, except to say it was a very difficult time and we are a family and we will always be a family, and we will get through this time and hopefully be a stronger family for it. Angelina said she will "always be a family" with Brad (Photo: Getty Images North America) Angelina recently returned to the spotlight following the split (Photo: PA) 
"Many, many people find themselves in this situation. My whole family, we’ve all being through a difficult time. My focus is my children, our children ... and my focus is finding this way through. 
"We are and forever will be a family. I am coping with finding a way through to make sure that this somehow makes us stronger and closer." Video Loading Click to play Tap to play The video will start in 8 Cancel Play now
